Insantiatingdigitalart

View the Project on GitHub oolawo09/insantiatingDigitalArt

the gist of it

Documenting my journey as I explore and analyse digital art projects spanning large geographical spaces and touching the lives of a diverse subset of people. These will be projects that live on the web (inclusive of purely hardware based projects) and are accessible via all sorts of digital devices.

This project is maintained by oolawo09
